languages.text: "Кейтан, прости меня. С самого основания нашего мира-корабля я взяла на себя обязательство заботиться о детях Крудараха, но мой собственный сын... О, мой Кейтан, отчего же твой {g|Encyclopedia:Path}Путь{/g} завел тебя так далеко от дома..."

traits.locale_text: "Кейтан, прости меня. С самого основания нашего мира-корабля я взяла на себя обязательство заботится о детях Крудараха, но мой собственный сын... О, мой Кейтан, отчего же твой {g|Encyclopedia:Path}Путь{/g} завел тебя так далеко от дома..."
traits.speaker: YrlietQ1_Farseer01

languages.text: "Forgive me, Caetan. Ever since the founding of our craftworld, I took upon myself the duty of caring for Crudarach's children, yet my own son... Oh, my Caetan, why did your {g|Encyclopedia:Path}Path{/g} have to take you so far from home..."
languages.original_text: "Кейтан, прости меня. С самого основания нашего мира-корабля я взяла на себя обязательство заботиться о детях Крудараха, но мой собственный сын... О, мой Кейтан, отчего же твой {g|Encyclopedia:Path}Путь{/g} завел тебя так далеко от дома..."

traits.locale_text: "Forgive me, Caetan. Ever since the founding of our craftworld, I took upon myself the duty of care for Crudarach's children, yet my own son... O my Caetan, why did your {g|Encyclopedia:Path}Path{/g} have to take you so far from home..."
traits.speaker: YrlietQ1_Farseer01

traits.locale_text: "Forgive me, Caetan. Ever since the founding of our craftworld, I took upon myself the duty of care for Crudarach's children, yet my own son... O my Caetan, why did your {g|Encyclopedia:Path}Path{/g} have to take you so far from home..."
traits.speaker: YrlietQ1_Farseer01

traits.locale_text: "Forgive me, Caetan. Ever since the founding of our craftworld, I took upon myself the duty of caring for Crudarach's children, yet my own son... Oh, my Caetan, why did your {g|Encyclopedia:Path}Path{/g} have to take you so far from home..."
traits.speaker: YrlietQ1_Farseer01

traits.locale_text: "Forgive me, Caetan. Ever since the founding of our craftworld, I took upon myself the duty of caring for Crudarach's children, yet my own son... Oh, my Caetan, why did your {g|Encyclopedia:Path}Path{/g} have to take you so far from home..."
traits.speaker: YrlietQ1_Farseer01

traits.locale_text: "Forgive me, Caetan. Ever since the founding of our craftworld, I took upon myself the duty of caring for Crudarach's children, yet my own son... Oh, my Caetan, why did your {g|Encyclopedia:Path}Path{/g} have to take you so far from home..."
traits.speaker: YrlietQ1_Farseer01

languages.text: «Perdóname, Caetan. Desde la fundación de nuestro mundo astronave me propuse cuidar de los hijos de Crudarach, y aun así mi propia carne... Oh, mi Caetan, por qué te ha llevado tu {g|Encyclopedia:Path}senda{/g} tan lejos de tu hogar...».
languages.original_text: "Forgive me, Caetan. Ever since the founding of our craftworld, I took upon myself the duty of caring for Crudarach's children, yet my own son... Oh, my Caetan, why did your {g|Encyclopedia:Path}Path{/g} have to take you so far from home..."

traits.locale_text: «Perdóname, Caetan. Desde la fundación de nuestro mundo astronave me propuse cuidar de los hijos de Crudarach, y aun así mi propia carne... Oh, mi Caetan, por qué te ha llevado tu {g|Encyclopedia:Path}senda{/g} tan lejos de tu hogar...
traits.speaker: YrlietQ1_Farseer01

languages.text: 「許してくれ、カエタン。我々の方舟が創造されて以来、私は自らに負った義務としてクルダラの子供たちの世話をしてきた。だが自分自身の息子には…ああ、私のカエタン。なぜお前の{g|Encyclopedia:Path}道{/g}は、故郷からこんなにも遠くへお前を連れて行ってしまったのか…」
languages.original_text: "Forgive me, Caetan. Ever since the founding of our craftworld, I took upon myself the duty of caring for Crudarach's children, yet my own son... Oh, my Caetan, why did your {g|Encyclopedia:Path}Path{/g} have to take you so far from home..."

traits.locale_text: 「許してくれ、カエタン。我々の方舟が創造されて以来、私は自らに負った義務としてクルダラの子供たちの世話をしてきた。だが自分自身の息子には…ああ、私のカエタン。なぜお前の{g|Encyclopedia:Path}道{/g}は、故郷からこんなにも遠くへお前を連れて行ってしまったのか…」
traits.speaker: YrlietQ1_Farseer01

languages.text: “原谅我吧，卡坦。自从我们的方舟世界建立以来，我就不得不承担起照顾克鲁达拉赫众多子嗣的责任，可我自己的儿子却……哦，我的卡坦，为什么你的{g|Encyclopedia:Path}道途{/g}要带到离家那么远的地方……”
languages.original_text: "Forgive me, Caetan. Ever since the founding of our craftworld, I took upon myself the duty of caring for Crudarach's children, yet my own son... Oh, my Caetan, why did your {g|Encyclopedia:Path}Path{/g} have to take you so far from home..."

traits.locale_text: “原谅我吧，卡坦。自从我们的方舟世界建立以来，我就不得不承担起照顾克鲁达拉赫众多子嗣的责任，可我自己的儿子却……哦，我的卡坦，为什么你的{g|Encyclopedia:Path}道途{/g}要带到离家那么远的地方……”
traits.speaker: YrlietQ1_Farseer01

languages.text: « Pardonne-moi, Caetan. Depuis la fondation de notre vaisseau-monde, je me suis fait un devoir de veiller sur les enfants de Crudarach, et pourtant mon propre fils... Oh, mon Caetan, pourquoi ta {g|Encyclopedia:Path}Voie{/g} t'a-t-elle mené si loin de chez nous... »
languages.original_text: "Forgive me, Caetan. Ever since the founding of our craftworld, I took upon myself the duty of caring for Crudarach's children, yet my own son... Oh, my Caetan, why did your {g|Encyclopedia:Path}Path{/g} have to take you so far from home..."

traits.locale_text: « Pardonne-moi, Caetan. Depuis la fondation de notre vaisseau-monde, je me suis fait un devoir de veiller sur les enfants de Crudarach, et pourtant mon propre fils... Oh, mon Caetan, pourquoi ta {g|Encyclopedia:Path}Voie{/g} t'a-t-elle mené si loin de chez nous... »
traits.speaker: YrlietQ1_Farseer01

languages.text: "Vergebt mir, Caetan. Seit Bau unseres Weltenschiffs übernahm ich die Aufgabe, mich um Crudarachs Kinder zu kümmern, aber mein eigener Sohn ... Oh, mein Caetan, warum musste Euch Euer {g|Encyclopedia:Path}Pfad{/g} so weit von zu Hause wegführen ..."
languages.original_text: "Forgive me, Caetan. Ever since the founding of our craftworld, I took upon myself the duty of caring for Crudarach's children, yet my own son... Oh, my Caetan, why did your {g|Encyclopedia:Path}Path{/g} have to take you so far from home..."

traits.locale_text: "Vergebt mir, Caetan. Seit Bau unseres Weltenschiffs übernahm ich die Aufgabe, mich um Crudarachs Kinder zu kümmern, aber mein eigener Sohn ... Oh, mein Caetan, warum musste Euch Euer {g|Encyclopedia:Path}Pfad{/g} so weit von zu Hause wegführen ..."
traits.speaker: YrlietQ1_Farseer01

languages.text: "Caetan, affet beni. Gemidünyamızın kuruluyla birlikte Crudarach'ın çocuklarıyla ilgilenme görevini üstlenmiştim. Fakat kendi oğlum... Canım Caetan'ım, {g|Encyclopedia:Path}Yolun{/g} neden seni yuvandan bu kadar uzağa götürdü..."
languages.original_text: "Forgive me, Caetan. Ever since the founding of our craftworld, I took upon myself the duty of caring for Crudarach's children, yet my own son... Oh, my Caetan, why did your {g|Encyclopedia:Path}Path{/g} have to take you so far from home..."

traits.locale_text: "Caetan, affet beni. Gemidünyamızın kuruluşundan bu yana Crudarach'ın çocuklarıyla ilgilenme görevini üstlenmiştim ama kendi oğlum... Ah, Caetan'ım benim, {g|Encyclopedia:Path}Yolun{/g} neden seni yuvandan bu kadar uzaklara çekti..."
traits.speaker: YrlietQ1_Farseer01
